instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-4924 No S0 rails
threads.message:
Liquid damaged board, has some signs of work already.

Green / Orange MagSafe

PP3V42 = 3V42
PPBUS_G3H = 12.6
PP5V_S5 = 5V
PP3V3_S5 = 3V3


No S0 Enables
No PM_SLP_S3 = 0V
U8180 has power to it

No pulsing on S0 rails.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-4924 No S0 rails
threads.message: What do you have on PM_SLP_S4_L

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-4924 No S0 rails
threads.message: You start with SUS and SLP_S4 stuff, SLP_S3 comes later. Are you using the correct charger 60W or more?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-4924 No S0 rails
threads.message:
[QUOTE="dukefawks, post: 7721"]You start with SUS and SLP_S4 stuff, SLP_S3 comes later. Are you using the correct charger 60W or more?[/QUOTE]

Ah, hello. I only have a 60Watt charger with a MagSafe to Magsafe2 shape adapter ATM, lost my 85W.

[QUOTE="dukefawks, post: 7721"]You start with SUS and SLP_S4 stuff, SLP_S3 comes later.[/QUOTE]

I'll check SUS and SLP_S4

I have a couple of questions if on of you guys would not mind answering.....
I have been going in circles on the schematic, noting what turns on what. S3 is sleep state right? So, what is the S4?
What rail powers the PCH?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-4924 No S0 rails
threads.message: Go and buy some real chargers.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-4924 No S0 rails
threads.message:
[QUOTE="dukefawks, post: 7730"]Go and buy some real chargers.[/QUOTE]

Already on the way. Is there any point at all fucking about with this machine until they arrive?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-4924 No S0 rails
threads.message:
My replacement 85Watt "Real Charger" arrived today.
Real charger = no problems

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-4924 No S0 rails
threads.message: So what does it do now?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-4924 No S0 rails
threads.message: So I can mark this as solved?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-4924 No S0 rails
threads.message:
Yes, all done. Just needed the 85W charger.
Mark as solved
